```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(HerringData)
library(SpawnIndex)
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
```

```{r data, include = FALSE}
# Data
data(pars)
data(codes_group)
data(conv_factors)
data(database_info)
```

```{r bio}
# Load and wrangle biological data: number- and weight-at-age 
bio <- load_bio(db_info = database_info) %>%
  filter(Region == "PRD") %>%
  siscah_bio(structure = "StatArea")
bio$number_age
bio$weight_age
```

```{r catch}
# Load and wrangle catch data
catch <- load_catch(db_info = database_info) %>%
  filter(Region == "PRD") %>%
  siscah_catch(structure = "StatArea")
catch
```

```{r spawn}
# Load spawn data and calculate spawn index
spawn <- load_spawn(db_info = database_info) %>%
  filter(Region == "PRD") %>%
  siscah_spawn(structure = "StatArea")
spawn
```
